application.name: 签到管家
application.ability: 签到,累计积分,防止淘宝,等积分规则
application.description: 签到,累计积分,防止淘宝,等积分规则
application.author: 柒|柒|源|码

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_yobyqiandao_goon` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '签到用户', `days` int(10) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '连续签到次数', `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_yobyqiandao_reply` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '规则id', `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '微信id', `jifen` varchar(10) DEFAULT '0,10' COMMENT '积分规则,默认随机0,10', `jifen2` varchar(2) DEFAULT '8' COMMENT '连续两天', `jifen3` varchar(2) DEFAULT '11' COMMENT '连续3天', `jifen4` varchar(2) DEFAULT '15' COMMENT '4天', `jifen5` varchar(2) DEFAULT '19' COMMENT '5天', `jifen6` varchar(2) DEFAULT '24' COMMENT '6天', `jifen7` varchar(2) DEFAULT '29' COMMENT '大于等于7天', `oktishi` varchar(300) DEFAULT '签到成功!' COMMENT '签到成功提示', `errortishi` varchar(300) DEFAULT '不在签到时间之内!' COMMENT '失败提示', `start_time` varchar(10) DEFAULT '00:00:00' COMMENT '开始签到时间', `end_time` varchar(10) DEFAULT '23:59:59' COMMENT '结束签到时间', `top10` int(10) DEFAULT '10' COMMENT '显示排行榜位数', `ad` text COMMENT '广告', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_yobyqiandao_log` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '签到时间', `jifen` int(10) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '积分', `top10` int(10) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排行榜', `uid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_yobyqiandao_goon`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_yobyqiandao_reply`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_yobyqiandao_log`;
